original: intros n H. induction H. - left. exists n. split. + apply in_bar_min_0. apply H. + intros. left. apply Nat.lt_le_incl. apply Nat.lt_succ_r. apply H0. - destruct IHbar_min as [m [HPm Hmin]]. + apply bar_min_ind with (S n). * apply H. * apply in_bar_min_1. + right. intros m H1. apply Nat.lt_le_incl in H1. apply Nat.nlt_ge in H1. apply H1 in Hmin. contradiction.
